name: CAR THIEF SIMULATOR 2017
description:
Try the new CAR THIEF SIMULATOR 2017 game!
You can learn couple of techniques and test your skills! It contains many cars on the street, but you don’t have endless time for take them. You will see numerical locks and you have to use car lock picks, but don’t worry we guarantee the tools for you. Hurry up because the cops are coming!

This is a really amusing simulator game for you.


Features:
  • 3 kind of locks
  • 18 stealable cars
  • practice mode
  • amazing graphic
